page.title: 10Day in Ellen Barlow's Life
page.content: The alarm rings at 7.30.I rise to make breakfast for Jonathan and Justine.I awake Jonathan at 7.45,then Justine at 8.Breakfast over,the children get dressed,I put on my tracksuit,do the dishes and make the beds.At 8.20 Jonathan rides to school.I take Justine to school at 8.45.I go to the shops and return home about 9.15.Ithen shower, dress and leave in time to get to work at 10.00.At the moment I am training showroom staff on packing procedure.I will then attend a meeting with the showroom leader to arrange staff training on Saturday.New stock arrives in the branch about mid-day.I discuss with the staff the layout in the Juvenile Department.At 2.00 I leave work and return home.
